data.title: Romantic and Elegant
data.text: Lovely, quiet atmosphere with private tables and curtains! Menu had many choices and it was quite an adventure to try the different fondue offerings. The wait staff was so helpful and made great suggestions. We were there for our anniversary - the perfect romantic spot! Would definitely return and try some more of the selections!

data.title: Always a great time.
data.text: Love this place and all the staff. Thanks again and good luck with St Jude great cause. Shout out to Jack, Will, and Andrew. Great people and awesome place.

owner_response.author: Will M, Manager at The Melting Pot, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your five star review! We appreciate you taking the time to give your feedback. We are so pleased to hear that you always have a great time dining with us. We will share your compliments with Will, Jack, Andrew and the rest of the staff. Stop in and see us again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very good
data.text: Dinner tonight with my son at melting pot. As usual service was prompt and attentive. The alpine swiss cheese is my favorite and was excellent as usual. My son loves the quatro formaggio . As usual we finished them.  Dont forget. To ask for pretzel bread.

owner_response.author: Will M, Manager at The Melting Pot, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for taking a moment to review The Melting Pot Coral Springs. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your fondue experience with us and you found our service to be attentive. We invite you and your son back very soon for more great fondue and hospitality!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Glad it was a Groupon....
data.text: Well let me start by saying it was not all bad or perhaps not bad at all. We went on a date and luckily we purchased from Groupon. This was my first time visiting the melting pot and it very well may be my last. Not that the staff did anything wrong but in all honesty we could have stayed home and cooked our own food. It's a unique experience (I guess) and perhaps something that should be tried at least once but just think about it....you're paying someone to cook your own food.

owner_response.author: Will M, Manager at The Melting Pot, responded to this review
owner_response.text: The management team at The Melting Pot thanks you for your honest feedback. We appreciate all comments, positive and negative. We are happy you found great value in our Groupon but we do understand that "fondue-ing" is a unique experience and not for everyone. Thank you again for taking the time to write a review; and we hope you give us another try.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best place for couples dining
data.text:
This was a really nice dinner spot for couples. A couple friend took my wife and I out for our anniversary. It was fantastic. The ambiance, food, service and everything. 

I wish I was there with just my wife. It's s magical place for couples and it's very intimate. It's a bit pricy but worth it. 

When you get to the chocolate part of the evening, get the ying yang chocolate combo.

owner_response.author: Will M, Manager at The Melting Pot, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your five star review! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your fondue experience with us and you found our service to be fantastic. We invite you to stop in again soon for more great fondue and hospitality!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fabulous
data.text:
We bought a Groupon for a dinner for two.  Called to make reservations and the staff was super nice.  We ended up in the area earlier than our reservation and they were able to get us a table earlier.  The service was helpful without hovering.  It seemed like the moment you thought you might need something, the server came by.

The fondue - cheese was excellent!  Salad nice with their delicious house dressing.  Next I had a mushroom ravioli dish - really nice.  And finally chocolate for dessert.  This is a fantastic restaurant for a leisurely dining experience.

owner_response.author: Will M, Manager at The Melting Pot, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Wow! Thank you Karen for such a lovely and detailed review. We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your fondue experience with us at The Melting Pot Coral Springs and you found our staff to be attentive. Thanks to guests like you, others can preview what The Perfect Night Out with us is like. For that, the management team is very grateful. We will share you kind words with the staff, and we look forward to hosting you again very soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: My daughter's birthday
data.text:
Was absolutely classic.
She turned 9 and wanted to go to melting pot so bad for her bday. My wife and I surprised her (tricked her) and told her we were just going to Wendy's.

We we not disappointed.
Our server was on point and the manager came by and ensured we were ok.
The food was yummy.

owner_response.author: Will M, Manager at The Melting Pot, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your five star review and thank you for choosing The Melting Pot Coral Springs to celebrate your daughter's 9th birthday. We appreciate you taking the time  to give your feedback as well as the compliments on our service. We invite you and your family back soon for more great fondue and hospitality!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Experience and always DELICIOUS!
data.text:
We absolutely LOVE this place!  Always such a great experience whether it's a family dinner or date night with just the two of us. Service is always exceptional and the food courses are always excellent. If you have never had fondue you must have your first experience here. And if you love fondue then this is the place for you!  
HIGHLY Recommended!

owner_response.author: Will M, Manager at The Melting Pot, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Wow! The management team at The Melting Pot Coral Springs thanks you so much for such an awesome review! We are so happy to hear that you enjoy the unique experience of "fondue-ing" and you found our service to be exceptional. We appreciate you taking the time to give your feedback; we will share your compliments with the entire team and we look forward to hosting you again very soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great place for family or date night
data.text: Great place, very cozy for a special occasion and enjoyable for a family night out as well.  There are also groupons available for this restaurant all the time which is a plus.

owner_response.author: Will M, Manager at The Melting Pot, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Wow! Thank you for your five star review; we are thrilled that you enjoyed your fondue experience at The Melting Pot Coral Springs and you found our restaurant to be cozy. We appreciate you taking the time to give your feedback, and we look forward to hosting you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Delicious!
data.text: A friend and I went to the Melting Pot to celebrate a late birthday. We had planned on simply cheese and chocolate courses and did not feel pressured into having the full 4 course meal. Our server, Amanda, was outstanding!  She suggested adding artisan meats to our cheese course and it was just perfect. The portions were just what we needed. The chocolate course was - well, it's chocolate -anything chocolate is good. This was what we expected - yum. We cannot say enough good things about this restaurant.  It was clean, well lit, private, if that's what you want, and the food was delicious. Looking forward to returning soon.

owner_response.author: Will M, Manager at The Melting Pot, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for such a lovely review! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your fondue experience with us and Amanda took such good care of you. We appreciate you taking the time to give your feedback so that others can preview what a perfect night out at The Melting Pot Coral Springs is like. We will share your compliments with Amanda and the rest of the team; we can't wait to host you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great experience
data.text: We chose this restaurant to celebrate my birthday and we had an amazing experience, we enjoyed the food, the service and the place

data.title: Awesome Birthday Dinner
data.text: The food was unique and amazing. The manager stopped by our table and was very cordial and fun to talk to. Gave my friend a box of their chocolate covered cherries as a gift!

We will share your compliments with the team; and we look forward to hosting you again soon.

data.title: Experience
data.text: Excellent customer service,  very romantic and the food was different but interesting and delicious.  Perfect scenery for a nice night out!

data.title: Always Fun!
data.text: The service is always great and the food always yummy! Be prepare because it takes over two hours to enjoy the four courses, but the time is well spend and worth it.

owner_response.author: Will M, Manager at The Melting Pot, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your five star review! We are delighted to hear that you always enjoy your dining experiences at The Melting Pot Coral Springs and that our staff consistently provides great service. We appreciate you taking the time to let others know what a dining experience with us is like; and we hope to have you back soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: service
data.text: Honestly everything is perfect but i always needed a refill and could never find my server and sitting in the wating area/lobby is loud and not romantic

owner_response.author: Will M, Manager at The Melting Pot, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for taking a moment to review The Melting Pot Coral Springs. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your experience, however please accept our sincerest apologies that our service did not live up to your expectations. We strive to deliver The Perfect Night Out every night and this is not what we want for our guests. Please email me at TheMeltingPotCoralSprings@gmail.com if you'd like to further discuss your experience. We appreciate you taking the time to give your feedback; and we will discuss it with the service staff so that we may better serve you in the future. We hope to see you back soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Been many times even better with Groupon!
data.text: If your in a rush to eat stay away. You cook your own food and it's a timely experience. Always a good time great service. Jake the manager is a great asset. Come once a month but now see they have a Groupon. WHAT A DEAL. No gimmicks. Will be back soon again miss the Aventura location.

owner_response.author: Will M, Manager at The Melting Pot, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Wow! Thank you so much for such an awesome review, we appreciate you taking the time to give your feedback about your experience at The Melting Pot Coral Springs. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your fondue experience with us and that Jack and our staff took such great care of you. We look forward to having you back very soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fun Time!
data.text: A great place to celebrate, a fun time. Whether your just a couple or with friends, it's a great fondue eatery.

owner_response.author: Will M, Manager at The Melting Pot, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your fondue experience with us. At The Melting Pot Coral Springs we pride ourselves on being the go-to place for any celebration or just a date night out with that special someone. We will share your compliments with the staff and we can't wait to host you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awesome dinner and relaxing  atmosphere.
data.text: Took a friend for birthday dinner. Made reservations for a Saturday night 6pm we were seated right away. We had the 4 course deal, it seems they start the cheese fondue in the kitchen now. I was disappointed that they no longer offer the salad or dressing that I loved. (Spinach and mushroom) and the warm dressing that was served with. They did make the salad for me but wasn't the same without the warm dressing. The entrée was delicious and the dessert was my favorite... Dark chocolate fondue. Our server could have been more on top of refreshments, but I guess having iced tea, is easy to neglect vs alcohol. To summarize... Was a great evening and I will return.

owner_response.author: Will M, Manager at The Melting Pot, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to give your feedback about your experience at The Melting Pot Coral Springs. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your fondue experience with us and that you plan to return. Please accept our apologies for any inconveniences throughout the evening. Thank you again for for your review and we hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good for special occasions
data.text: The price is going to preclude you from making this your 'once a week' favorite but for a splurge on a special occasion or if you're in town on vacation, The Melting Pot is a worthwhile stop.  The food is a bit confusing to order so let your server be your guide.  Surprisingly I liked the chicken better than the more expensive cuts of steak.  You're cooking them yourself at the table in a pot of boiling broth which is the experience for which you are paying a bit extra.  The desserts were good and my daughter loved the whole process.

owner_response.author: Will M, Manager at The Melting Pot, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for taking a moment to review The Melting Pot Coral Springs. We are delighted to hear that you and your daughter enjoyed your fondue experience with us and our staff guided you through the whole process. We're always running different specials, you can like us on social media and sign up for Club Fondue for exclusive invitations. We also have Happy Hour on weekdays from 4-6PM. These are a few ways you can get more value for your money. Thank you again for your feedback and we can't wait to host you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
